about_the_game:
The Soundtrack of Bulb Boy - over 30 minutes of music by Bartosz Gajdarski.
  • FLAC and MP3
  • 30'12''
  • 9 tracks + 4 bonus tracks
  • 44100 kHz sample rate
  • 695/320 kbps
  • Stereo

Complete track list:
00. Trailer (1'03'')
01. I feel so eerie (9'25'')
02. Friends forever even when you're gone (4'25'')
03. Feell into the adventure of my life (4'41'')
04. If this is the end then let it be (4'16'')
05. Fart You Grandma! (2'20'')
06. BulbHop (ending) (1'07'')
07. Window view loop (ingame) (0'20'')
08. Bubble sequence (ingame) (0'48'')
09. Bonus Track - TV BulbRingu theme (ingame) (0'36'')
10. Bonus Track - TV BulbMan theme (ingame) (0'16'')
11. Bonus Track - TV 8th passenger of Bulbomo theme (ingame) (0'40'')
12. Bonus Track - Bulb plays the videogame (ingame) (0'09'')
